item.title: Apache Kafka
item.description: Apache Kafka Introduction In this article, we are going to talk about apache kafka which is an open-source distributed streaming platform that was developed by the Apache Software Foundation. It is designed to handle large volumes of real-time data and enables the efficient processing, storage, and analysis of data streams. kafka Cluster cluster : Our cluster can be illustrated as below : Producer : In Kafka, a producer is a client application that is responsible for publishing data to one or more Kafka topics.
